verbs.description: hcc to host panel discussion on sex assault senator marilyn moore d - bridgeport and women rights advocates from across the state [V: will] host a panel discussion on the state of women rights and sexual assault and trauma on thursday at housatonic community college beacon hall event room 900 lafayette blvd bridgeport panelists include experts from the alliance to end sexual violence planned parenthood of southern new england and other women rights advocates doors open at 5 p m and refreshments will be served the panel discussion begins at 6 p m sexual assault victim advocates and public health experts will discuss resources and explain the impact of trauma victimization and recovery and how trauma affects the community at large bridgeport connecticut bridgeport new england senator marilyn moore housatonic community college assault beacon hall event room marilyn moore
